title: Venter, Dr Michael - Integrative Medicine
description: Michael focuses on determining underlying biochemical imbalances in the body through the use of lab testing, to determine causative factors in disease formation, and then make use of Nutritional and Herbal protocols, Education, Diet and Lifestyle Change protocols. ASCHP registered
sitename: South African Society of Integrated Medicine
